# slider

**Type Property**

Indicates that a slider’s thumb has been released (touch up).

## Declaration

```swift
static let slider: SensoryFeedback.ReleaseFeedback
```

## Discussion

Slider controls should also play [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SensoryFeedback/press(_:)] with [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/SensoryFeedback/PressFeedback/slider].

Only plays feedback on visionOS.
title: slider
